publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1755 Chris Ballance: Congratulations on Move to Holyrood—That the Parliament notes the smooth flitting of equipment, papers and materials from George IV Bridge during the migration to Holyrood and warmly congratulates the workforce involved, the implementation team, planners, porters and others, for having successfully performed this unique operation.

S2M-1755 Chris Ballance: Congratulations on Move to Holyrood—That the Parliament notes the smooth flitting of equipment, papers and materials from George IV Bridge during the migration to Holyrood and warmly congratulates the workforce involved, the implementation team, planners, porters and others, for having successfully performed this unique operation.
S2M-1755 Congratulations on Move to Holyrood (lodged on 23 September 2004) Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-1755 Congratulations on Move to Holyrood (lodged on 23 September 2004) Tricia Marwick*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Pauline McNeill*, John Farquhar Munro*, Patrick Harvie*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Shiona Baird*, Donald Gorrie*, Rosie Kane*, Eleanor Scott*, Linda Fabiani*, Murray Tosh*, Murdo Fraser*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-1755 Congratulations on Move to Holyrood (lodged on 23 September 2004) Bruce Crawford*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Robin Harper*, Karen Gillon*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1755 Congratulations on Move to Holyrood (lodged on 23 September 2004) Trish Godman*
S2M-1755 Congratulations on Move to Holyrood (lodged on 23 September 2004) Frances Curran*
S2M-1755 Congratulations on Move to Holyrood (lodged on 23 September 2004) Mike Pringle*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Jackie Baillie*, Phil Gallie*, Mark Ballard*
S2M-1755 Congratulations on Move to Holyrood (lodged on 23 September 2004) Kate Maclean*
S2M-1755 Congratulations on Move to Holyrood (lodged on 23 September 2004) Susan Deacon*
S2M-1755 Congratulations on Move to Holyrood (lodged on 23 September 2004) Cathy Peattie*
